General.Name: Bubang Co. Ltd
General.Description: Bubang Co., Ltd. operates a discount store primarily in South Korea. It also manufactures and sells household appliances, including home and kitchen appliances; and offers IT consulting and establishment services. The company was formerly known as Lihom-Cuchen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bubang Co., Ltd. in June 2015. Bubang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

3.Name: Hyung-Mo  Koo
3.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Head of Laboratory
